name: Service Box Slider
author: Sk Abul Hasan

sections.description:
Live Demo | Support | Upgrade to Pro!

Service Box Showcase is a powerful & robust but easy to represent your services with grid and slider. It comes with 50 unique layouts and creates unlimited service showcases with 200+ custom fields.

Service Box offers you to add an owl carousel type grid slider containing services name, description, image, icons, external or internal URL.

Features Of Plugin

  • Responsive Design
  • Font Awesome Icon Support
  • 1600+ Font Awesome Icon Picker Integrated
  • Clean Design & Code
  • No Coding Required
  • Live preview supported
  • 10 Different Service Styles with Carousel
  • Easy Service Option Page.
  • Display Service Box by the group.
  • Limitless Service Box anywhere in the theme
  • Drag and Drop builder API integrated.
  • Draggable FAQ items for easy sorting
  • Use via short-codes
  • Awesome input field for Service Box content
  • Unlimited color option
  • Fully CSS based so lightweight than Bootstrap framework based plugins
  • Less for quick customization
  • Gulp for instant workflow
  • Highly customized for User Experience
  • Slick Frontend and backend UI
  • Add and remove Service Box item from the backend.
  • Multiple Advanced Custom Field Available
  • All browser compatible

Service Pro Features

  • Responsive Design
  • 50+ Design Templates
  • Add Read More link
  • Custom Image Icon Option
  • Individual Color Settings
  • 4 types of background Overlay
  • Hover Animation
  • Preview Option
  • Widget Option
  • Limitless Services anywhere in the theme
  • Set Height Option
  • 1600+ Font Awesome Icon Support
  • 500+ Glyphicon Icons Support
  • Drag and Drop builder API integrated.
  • Section Background Customization
  • Parallax image Background Option
  • Draggable items for easy sorting
  • Use via short-codes
  • Awesome input field for content
  • Unlimited color option
  • Bootstrap framework based
  • Less for quick customization
  • Border Color Customization
  • Font Awesome Icon Picker Integrated
  • Two different styles Integrated
  • Gulp for instant workflow
  • Highly customized for User Experience
  • Slick Frontend and backend UI
  • Add and remove items from backend easily.
  • Multiple Advanced Custom Field Available
  • All browser compatible

Service box is an effective tool in WordPress for creating amazing service showcase and sliders with beautiful transition effects. With this awesome plugin, you can add services along with their description and link so that viewers can evaluate the weight of your services so easily. This will certainly help you a lot in your business exposure.

Our rich library of templates will definitely help the user to pick the right one for them. You can build an interactive service page within minutes by using Service Box with Slider plugin. It is very easy to use the provided shortcode into the posts and pages. You can also put the shortcode into the page builders, thus, it can be included in the theme for displaying the services within the theme using PHP function.

We provide a free 1600+ font awesome icon with our service box with slider plugin along with some cool features to play with. You can find so much flexibility with our plugin. With service box with slider plugin, you can select your preferred style from multiple service templates and FAQs styles.
